remarks: Definition of a strictly monotone ordinal function.  Definition 7.46 in [TakeutiZaring] p. 50.  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Nov-2011.)
statement:
df-smo $p |- ( Smo A <-> ( A : dom A --> On /\ Ord dom A /\ A. x e. dom A A. y e. dom A ( x e. y -> ( A ` x ) e. ( A ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
